tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hyderabad hospitals environment and working culture is new to me. I don‚Äôt  know why they insist/mandate Aadhar details for general consultation and regular checkups.  This clinic located in Banjara Hills, has to improve their ambiance to crate a positive environment. 

The only positive point is the Dr approach to understand, hear and analyse the issue and will suggest only the required tests. 


The staff should learn to consolidate all should have one single billing.  I made 3 payments in one consultant. 

Do not agree for blood tests in this clinic. They are outsourcing the tests and will not share the reports, even on request to share online they are reluctant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is our genuine and heartfelt review on Dr Hari Chandana Madam and Happy to share the news that after so many years we are gonna be parents all because of excellent treatment by Dr Hari Chandana Madam. We visited multiple fertility centres for five years before coming to Nova but all in vain as almost all the fertility centres intimidated us in the name of age factor and directly suggested to go for IVF treatment and as a last attempt we visited Dr Chandana and she is the first doctor who suggested to go for IUI instead of IVF and we are happy to share that in the first attempt of IUI the result came out positive and my wife is pregnant now. Though pregnancy is a long journey getting the ***** treatment from the right doctor is very important as well and Dr Chandana came to our rescue when we were really stressed out due to infertility.

Dr Chandana is an excellent doctor and she made us comfortable with detailed explanation about the treatment. Dr Chandana treats her patients with empathy as most of the couples are in a state of depression because of infertility and I strongly believe if you come across the right doctor you can overcome infertility and Dr Chandana rightly fits the bill in terms of a perfect doctor.

Dr Chandana patiently listens to her patients concerns and will always help in clearing her patients doubts. We are extremely happy with her treatment and she is really a ray of hope for wannabe moms. I suggest everyone who is suffering with infertility problem to visit Dr Hari Chandana Madam and just blindly believe in her treatment, positive results will follow.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Thanks to Esha IVF fertility center for fulfilling our dream of parenthood. Thanks to Dr. Chandana lakkireddi and Dr. Chandini and staff for being supportive through our journey at Esha ivf. Esha ivf is the best fertility center in Hyderabad.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We are very thankful to Dr. Chandana madam and the entire team. We finally have a positive pregnancy. 

Dr. Chandana madam is humble and down to earth person. She is an excellent doctor and she made us comfortable with detailed explanation about the treatment. She listens to patients concerns and always help in clearing patients doubts. The whole team is very good and soft spoken and explains everything very nicely. Best thing here is transparency in treatment. When we visited hospital staff recieved us very well. Everyone is smiling and helpfull. 

We would highly recommend this hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very thankful to Dr Chandana Lakkireddi Mam for making my dream come true. I have been referred to her by my family doctor for problem in my husband's semen count and motility. After detailed evaluation doctor suggested to go for ICSI/IVF treatment , which initially I was very anxious about. But doctor's detailed explanation, personalised approach and taking care at every step made my journey easier. I am very glad to conceive in my first attempt itself. I highly recommend mam for infertility treatments.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: thanks a lot to chandana madam for helping me to make my dream come true. I have been married for 15 yrs and was roaming multiple infertility centers with no result. undergone 5 times IUI with no result. finally approached Dr Chandana Madam with my Gynaec guidance. She advised ICSI treatment , which is successful in 1st attempt. Mainly she never asks to repeat tests which are done outside and explains in detail why the previous treatment wouldn't have worked and why she is suggesting this treatment. Thanks once again Dr Chandana

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Very much professional approach and  friendly team of doctors and nurses. treatment options have been clearly explained and very ethical and transparent. We got positive in our first IVF treatment with Era procedure. 
thanks to Esha IVF and Dr Chandana

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I would recommend Dr Chandana for IVF treatment as she is very experienced and qualified in infertility. I have been referred by my relative to mam and by looking at my husband's reports which showed high number of abnormal sperm, she recommended ivf/Icsi treatment , which is successful in my first attempt itself. not only success , mam explains everything clearly and uses minimum medications so no side effects.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Firstly we are very thanks to our stars that we met Dr Chandana. From the day I met her I was made very comfortable to discuss my issues and day by day. journey with her and her team went very smooth. I have seen the Doctor to extend a lot of comfort to her patients and they way she helps you in any situation is amazing. No doubt she and her entire staff has done an amazing work. From the day one there was a process where they listen to our issue and guide and help us overcome it with counselling or with treatment. They are not hard and fast method on anything. The entire staff is very supportive. Because of them we are pregnant today and we thank them from the bottom of our heart. We are extremely grateful to them. I was also surprised to see the advancement in our science. She is a one stop solution. I strong recommend people to meet her for any sort of fertility help.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It is just not a review, it's all about our experience, feelings and attachment with this fertility center. Yes, I'm conceivedüòä and it's 5th week through(IVF/ICSI). Since 6years we are waiting to hear this news, and it all happened through Esha...it not about hospital it all about Dr. Chandana garu who patiently listened to our problems, who spoke to us friendly and guided us to success path.   Highly recommended to couples who are struggling with infertility problems.  Trust the doctor and trust the treatment. All the staff and other department doctors are also friendly and polite. People visiting Esha with any infertility problem, surely you will step out with a solution or good news. Once again I thank üôèüôè to Dr. Chandana garu. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** Please visit Esha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We hv been 7 yrs without a baby . Only if we had met her in more early years . She was so polite . Explained everything n her voice had so much hope . We had already been to fertility centers in the US, but all were trying to find the problem instead of solving, so we came to india found her name to be pretty known and took a leap of faith . When my first cycle failed and i was left no hope and  two embryos, she carefully chose a treatment plan that wont lead to a future failure  n that choice came to be true . All thanks to god for helping us find her. . Im pregnant now 5 weeks , for the first time in 7 yrs . She is the true definition of a doctor. Listens to her patients , hears all their concerns , answers all their doubts and is Worried abt the patient‚Äôs condition more than anything else . Her only focus is solving the patients problem. I would recommend her for everyone out there , trying fr a chance at parenthood . She is the one .
Medam understand our health issues clearly and plan the treatment. The good thing during our journey is Medam will give us a lots of hope and confidence that reduces our strees during the treatment.

After visiting Dr Chandana madam clinic with in 2 months my wife got pregnant. Thanks to the Dr. Chandana madam and her team.
